[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23231-3-1346249162.jpg][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23231-3-1346249162.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23231-1-1346185156.jpg][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23231-1-1346185156.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23231-1-1346222302.jpg][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23231-1-1346222302.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23231-1-1346281308.jpg][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23231-1-1346281308.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23231-2-1346296877.jpg][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23231-2-1346296877.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23231-1-1346469118.jpg][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23231-1-1346469118.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1346176848.png[/img]

This mod adds four new armours to the game, each set consists of 4 parts:

- Body
- Boots
- Gauntlets
- Circlet

All armours are based on Kurese's work. I have created new textures and added chainmail to each armour.
They can be found in various dungeons.

The following armours are included:

[u]Maiden Vagabond[/u]

Location:
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1346177063.jpg][img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1346176926.png[/img][/url]

Light
- Body: AR 24.5 Weight 7
- Boots: AR 6 Weight 2
- Gauntlets: AR 6 Weight 2
- Circlet: AR Weight

Heavy
- Body: AR 33.5 Weight 35
- Boots: AR 12.5 Weight 8
- Gauntlets: AR 12.5 Weight 8
- Circlet: AR 8.5 Weight 2.5

[u]Blade Dancer[/u]

Location:
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-2-1346177063.jpg][img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1346176927.png[/img]
[/url]
Light
- Body: AR 27.5 Weight 6
- Boots: AR 7.5 Weight 2
- Gauntlets: AR 7.5 Weight 2
- Circlet: AR 6 Weight 1

Heavy
- Body: AR 40 Weight 38
- Boots: AR 14.5 Weight 9
- Gauntlets: AR 14.5 Weight 9
- Circlet: AR 9.5 Weight 3

[u]Royal Scout[/u]

Location:
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1346177064.jpg][img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1346176926.png[/img][/url]

Light
- Body: AR 33.5 Weight 6
- Boots: AR 10 Weight 1
- Gauntlets: AR 10 Weight 1
- Circlet: AR 8 Weight 2

Heavy
- Body: AR 44.5 Weight 39
- Boots: AR 16.5 Weight 7
- Gauntlets: AR 16.5 Weight 7
- Circlet: AR 10.5 Weight 4

[u]Lady Bulwark[/u]

Location:
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-4-1346177064.jpg][img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-2-1346176927.png[/img]
[/url]
Light
- Body: AR 39.5 Weight 8
- Boots: AR 11.5 Weight 3
- Gauntlets: AR 11.5 Weight 3
- Circlet: AR 8 Weight 2

Heavy
- Body: AR 47.5 Weight 40
- Boots: AR 17.5 Weight 8
- Gauntlets: AR 17.5 Weight 8
- Circlet: AR 11 Weight 5

Circlets can be used by both genders.
All armours are female only, for one simple reason: the originals were as well.
I have no modelling skills, so I doubt male versions of these armours will be available anytime soon.

However, it is possible that other armours, including male ones, will be added at a later time.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1346176883.png[/img]

[29-08-2012] 1.1

- Fixed normal maps of "Maiden Vagabond"
- Added "Lite" version

[28-09-2012] 1.2

- Added support for SkyRe
- Made all armours craftable
- Made all armours improvable
- Changed all circlets' armour type to "ArmorHelmet"

Many thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3129449]Ysale[/url] for creating this update!

[img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1346176848.png[/img]

1. Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
2. Find the Data folder here: Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data
3. Move the XAC.esp and XAD.bsa files into your Data folder.
4. Activate the XAC.esp file.

[b]Lite:[/b]
1. Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
2. Find the Data folder here: Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data
3. Move the XAC.esp file and the textures and meshes folders into your Data folder.
4. Activate the XAC.esp file.

[img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-4-1346176848.png[/img]

Deactivate the XAD.esp file

Remove the following files:
Data\XAC.esp
Data\XAC.bsa

[b]Lite:[/b]
Remove the following files and folders:
Data\XAC.esp
Data\textures\Xenius\Armour
Data\meshes\Xenius\Armour

[img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1346176865.png[/img]

Due to the lack of visible skin a body replacer is not required.

[img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-2-1346176865.png[/img]

None yet.

[img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1346176865.png[/img]

None yet.

[img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-4-1346176865.png[/img]

[28-08-2012] 1.0 - Initial Release
[29-08-2012] 1.1 - Update
[28-09-2012] 1.2 - Update

[img]http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1346176883.png[/img]

The content of this mod is open source and can be used freely on the following conditions:

- Credit me
- Credit other authors if necessary
- Notify me
